short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle print styles for web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Print Styles Toggle can be pinned to your toolbar in order to toggle between page views styles and print view styles.  This is useful for developing printable regions on web pages, viewing bloated recipe pages, or any other page you want to view as if it was being printed without using print preview.

You can event follow links and interact with the page normally.

This extension needs to be pinned to your toolbar to enable toggling of the view style.
